articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Active Leading Personnel of WPRG
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Active Leading Personnel of  WPRG
						
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with participants in the meeting of active leading personnel of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards (WPRG).
					 When Kim Jong Un came to the venue of the photo session, all the participants enthusiastically welcomed him.
					
					 He waved back to their cheers. He warmly encouraged them who are devoting themselves to the sacred struggle for defending the country and building an economic power, holding a rifle in one hand and a hammer, sickle or a writing brush in the other.
					
					 Saying the meeting marked an important occasion in glorifying President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's Juche-based idea of building militia forces and the leadership exploits performed by them and in further strengthening the civilian defence forces, he congratulated them upon making the meeting successful before having a photo session with them.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the participants in the meeting would thoroughly implement the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the WPK's policy on putting all the people under arms and fortifying the whole country and thus bring about a fresh revolutionary turn in bolstering up the combat capabilities of the WPRG.
					
					 Present there were General of the Internal Security Forces Choe Pu Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and minister of People's Security, and O Il Jong, department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A national meeting for celebrating the 72nd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il took place here Saturday.
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, took the platform.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, persons of merit, working people in Pyongyang, delegations of overseas compatriots, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies and military attaches here.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said:
					
					 The revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il was the life of a great revolutionary and peerless patriot as he dedicated his all to the victory of the revolution and rosy future of the country like a blazing flame.
					
					 He experienced all sorts of difficulties and trials in the sternest test of the times and explored an untrodden path of the revolution with his iron will and superhuman energy.
					
					 He was a brilliant thinker and theoretician and eternal teacher of the army and people of the DPRK as he provided ideological and theoretical treasure for ensuring the permanent victory of the country and the revolution with his rare wisdom and scientific insight.
					
					 He was a peerlessly brilliant commander and genius of creation and construction as he provided a powerful military groundwork and strong economic foundation for the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into the world's military power and nuclear weapons state which no one dares provoke under the uplifted banner of Songun. This is the miracle unprecedented in the human history of politics and a great exploit in the nation's history to shine for all ages.
					
					 He was an outstanding statesman who provided a firm political guarantee for the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun.
					
					 It was the distinguished exploit performed by him that he settled most ideally and perfectly the issue of succession to the revolutionary cause, a pressing matter decisive of the destiny of the country and the revolution, as required by the desire of the people and the developing revolution.
					
					 He ushered in the June 15 era of reunification based on the idea of By Our Nation Itself by wisely leading all the fellow countrymen along the road of independent reunification and great national unity with immensely broad magnanimity, tolerance and noble patriotism.
					
					 He made an immortal contribution to strengthening the international position of the DPRK and increasing its influence, frustrating the war moves of the imperialists and defending peace in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The reporter stressed that Kim Jong Il's idea and cause and eternal treasure of the revolution provided by him are being successfully carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called for glorifying Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and immortal exploits for all ages, holding him in high esteem as the eternal leader of the Korean revolution generation after generation, and keeping to the road of independence, Songun and socialism to the last which he covered all his life.
					
					 Remaining true to the idea of its foreign policy -- independence, peace and friendship -- the DPRK will boost the relations of friendship and cooperation with all the countries that respect its sovereignty and are friendly to it, and make positive efforts for global peace and security and common prosperity of mankind, he concluded.
					
					 Similar meetings took place in each province, city and county and at industrial complexes of the DPRK on the same day.

articles.title: Greetings to Serbian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Serbian President
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Tomislav Nikolic, president of the Republic of Serbia, on its national day.
					 Kim in the message expressed conviction that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Serbia would continue developing and wished the friendly Serbian people steady progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Serbian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Serbian PM
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Saturday sent a message of greeting to Ivica Dacic, prime minister of the Republic of Serbia, on its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Serbia would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples, wishing the prime minister greater success in his work for the independent development and prosperity of the country.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to his Serbian counterpart Ivan Mrkic on the same day.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Thursday received a message of greeting from Bashar Al Assad, president of Syria. 
					 The message said:
					
					 I am pleased to celebrate February 16, 2014, the 72nd birth anniversary of H.E. leader Kim Jong Il, together with Your Excellency. 
					
					 I wish Your Excellency and your family good health and happiness and the friendly Korean people bigger progress and prosperity. 
					
					 Please accept my highest regards.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the board director of the Shenyang Korean Trade and Investment Consulting Co. Ltd and his party who are taking part in the 18th Kimjongilia Festival.
					 The gift was handed over to an official concerned by Board Director Liu Chensheng.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Foreigners
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with floral baskets by foreigners on Saturday on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il).
					 They were the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, the Switzerland-Korea Committee, Miyagi Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association and Takashi Nada, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Here
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Here
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. headed by Secretary General Kim Hyon Hwan arrived here on Saturday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Arriving earlier was Ri Chae Son, vice-chairperson of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia.

articles.title: Chinese, Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chinese, Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Chinese and overseas Koreans who are taking part in the 18th Kimjongilia Festival visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They were Yang Hongzhun, general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Hunchun, China, Liu Chensheng, board director of the Shenyang Korean Trade and Investment Consulting Co. Ltd., Choe Ryong Ho, vice-president of Yanbian University of Science and Technology of China, and Ri Yong Ho, managing director of the Dandong Shengmin Trading Co. Ltd., China, and their parties.
					
					 They looked round the historic relics preserved with much care in the old home of the President in Mangyongdae, being briefed on the glorious revolutionary history of the President and his families.
					
					 They went round the revolutionary sites on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 At the end of the visit Liu Chensheng said:
					
					 Whenever I visit Mangyongdae, I feel something fresh here in the holy site of the revolution.
					
					 Kim Il Sung embarked on the road of revolution in his teens to liberate the country.
					
					 Today I am deeply impressed by the fact that Marshal Kim Jong Un is carrying forward the revolutionary cause and leading the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 I extend my heartfelt thanks to the President, who liberated the country and brought happiness to the Korean people.
					
					 Ri Yong Ho said his visit to Mangyongdae made him feel stronger yearning for the President, adding:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was born in a simple farmhouse and left his birthplace in his teens to make a revolution for the liberation of the country and nation.
					
					 I picture to myself the image of Kim Il Sung waging a bloody struggle for the revolution.
					
					 I also think of the President's grandparents looking forward to the day of the liberation of the country at the brushwood gate of the old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Unha Scientists' Street and other places.

articles.title: Officials of Chinese Embassy Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
articles.content:
Officials of Chinese Embassy Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival 
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai and staff members of his embassy visited the venue of the 18th Kimjongilia Festival on Saturday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 They looked round the immortal flowers in full bloom reflecting deep reverence of the Korean people and other progressives in the world who highly laud Kim Jong Il as a peerlessly great man. 
					
					 The ambassador made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il by Russian Paper, Bereaved Family of DPRK Hero
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il by Russian Paper, Bereaved Family of DPRK Hero
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Patriot and Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, sent floral baskets to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il).
					 The floral baskets were laid before the statues on Saturday.

articles.title: Chinese Embassy Officials Lay Floral Basket before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Chinese Embassy Officials Lay Floral Basket before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Saturday on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il).
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues and paid tribute to them in humblest reverence for the peerlessly great men.

articles.title: Statement of Spokesman for Policy Department of NDC of DPRK Distributed as UNSC Official Document
articles.content:
Statement of Spokesman for Policy Department of NDC of DPRK Distributed as UNSC Official Document
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- "South Korean Authorities Should Clarify Their Ulterior Design before Whole Nation", the statement issued by the spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK, was distributed as UN Security Council's official document S/2014/84 on February 13.

articles.title: DPRK Embassy in Moscow Hosts Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Embassy in Moscow Hosts Reception
 Moscow, February 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Moscow hosted a reception on February 13 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among those present on invitation were officials of the government, political parties, organizations and organs of Russia. They included those of the Russian Foreign Ministry, Federal Council, State Duma, United Russia Party, Communist Party of the Russian Federation, "A Just Russia", Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, Communist Party of the Soviet Union, Russian Railways Company, Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow War Veterans Committee, Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK and the  United Confederation of Koreans in Russia.
					
					 Present there were the DPRK ambassador to Russia and staff members of the embassy.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before a full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Kim Yong Jae, DPRK ambassador to Russia, highly praised the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il, who devoted his all to the happiness and prosperity of the generations to come.
					
					 He reiterated the will to boost the traditional bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation this significant year marking the 65th anniversary of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 Kulik, director of the Asia 1 Department of the Russian Foreign Ministry, said that he recollects with deep emotion the great feats performed by Kim Jong Il for the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 Clarifying his stand to make a positive contribution to boosting the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries and ensuring peace and security in Northeast Asia, he wished the friendly Korean people new successes in their drive for achieving national reconciliation and economic development and improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 A performance was given by Russian artistes.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize Int'l Figure Skating Festival Opens
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize Int'l Figure Skating Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The 23rd Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival opened here on Saturday to celebrate the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il).
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Ro Tu Chol, officials concerned, sportspersons and other people.
					
					 Also on hand were overseas Koreans, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic corps and military attaches corps here and foreign guests.
					
					 Figure skaters of the DPRK, Russia, Latvia, Belarus, Italy, the Czech Republic and Serbia entered the venue of the opening ceremony.
					
					 Minister of Finance Choe Kwang Jin, chairman of the Figure Skating Association, in his opening address expressed belief that the festival will greatly inspire the Korean people making a leap forward in the drive to building a highly civilized country under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 There took place a figure skating demonstration "The sun of Songun will be everlasting".
					
					 DPRK players presented colorful numbers such as "Longing is boundless" and "Ode to the Motherland".
					
					 Foreign players who proved successful at international and national contests showed high skills in various numbers.
					
					  The audience applauded performers whenever they presented fascinating and graceful rhythms and skilful movements.

articles.title: Figure Skating Festival Goes On in DPRK
articles.content:
Figure Skating Festival Goes On in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The 23rd Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival marking the Day of the Shining Star is going on at the Ice Rink here.
					 This annual event reflects the desire and will of the world people to celebrate February 16, the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il, as a holiday common to humankind.
					
					 Taking part in the current festival are figure skaters from the DPRK, Russia, Latvia, Belarus, Italy, the Czech Republic and Serbia who have proven successful in international and domestic tournaments.
					
					 Its opening ceremony took place on Saturday with a demonstration performance which well represented deep reverence for leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In particular, skaters of Russia, Serbia and Latvia showed movements of high technique, performing to the melodies of such Korean songs as "the General Star" and "Boundless Is Our Yearning".
					
					 Samuel Contesti, an Italian skater, told KCNA he was pleased to attend the festival in the DPRK, adding that its citizens are very kind and the festival organization is admirable. He was moved to witness the people's deep interest in the festival and wanted to know well about the DPRK, touring different parts of Pyongyang, he said.
					
					The festival continues until 17.

articles.title: Performance of Synchronized Swimming Given
articles.content:
Performance of Synchronized Swimming Given
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A demonstration performance of synchronized swimming "May Cause of Mt. Paektu Shine" was given at the swimming pool of the Changgwang Health Complex on Saturday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star). 
					 Among the spectators were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), officials of the party organs, working people's organizations and ministries, working people in Pyongyang, overseas Koreans delegations, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of missions of international organizations here and their wives and foreign guests. 
					
					 The performers presented such colorful numbers of synchronized swimming as "Thinking of General," "The General Is the Son of the Guerrillas" and "Song of Love for People". 
					
					 The performers represented with graceful rhythms and a variety of formation change the profound reverence for Kim Jong Il, who made ceaseless forced march of patriotic devotion with his iron will and superhuman energy till the last moments of his life.
					
					 In "Party's Flag, Always with You," "Our Tender-hearted Sun" and other numbers of synchronized swimming the performers represented the happiness and pride of the Korean people holding in high esteem the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and high revolutionary enthusiasm of all the service personnel and people advancing towards the rosy future of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 It demonstrated the faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to unite close around Marshal Kim Jong Un and hasten a final victory in the drive for a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Posters on Election of Deputies to 13th SPA Produced
articles.content:
Posters on Election of Deputies to 13th SPA Produced
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Posters to arouse high political enthusiasm of the army and people of the DPRK were produced with the approach of the election of deputies to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA).
					 Posters "Let us all vote for deputies!" and "Let us all consolidate our revolutionary power as firm as a rock!" created by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House bear the letters "March 9 is the day of the election of deputies to the SPA."
					
					 Depicted in the posters are a service person, worker, farmer and intellectual filled with pride and self-confidence of being the masters of the people's power and a person voting for deputies against the background of the national emblem and flag of the DPRK.

articles.title: First Democratic Election in DPRK
articles.content:
First Democratic Election in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the election of deputies to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) in the DPRK on March 9, the Korean people recollect with deep emotion the days when democratic election took place for the first time in the country. 
					 After the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, President Kim Il Sung ensured that the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea was inaugurated and pressed ahead with the work to develop it to be the People's Committee of North Korea.
					
					 After advancing a line on founding a democratic people's republic, he saw to it that the local people's committees were formed by the popular masses.
					
					 A provision on election of deputies to the local people's committees at all levels was enacted at the second enlarged meeting of the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea held early in September Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 The meeting also made a decision on having elections of deputies to provincial, city and county people's committees in all parts of north Korea on November 3 that year.
					
					 Significance of the election and the progressive nature of the electoral system were clarified at the 5th session of the Central Committee of the Democratic National United Front of North Korea and the 2nd meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of North Korea, held in September 1946.
					
					 Thereby, candidates for deputies to the people's committees at all levels were nominated throughout the country.  
					
					 The Samdung-myon Constituency in Kangdong County, South Phyongan Province nominated Kim Il Sung as a candidate for deputy to the South Phyongan Provincial People's Committee in October 1946, in representation of the unanimous desire of all the Korean people. 
					
					 He personally went to Kangdong, Junghwa, Sakju and other counties to give guidance to election preparations.
					
					 With political enthusiasm running high among all the people, a democratic election was held with success on November 3, 1946, the first of its kind in the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Priority to Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Priority to Nation
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- It is important to firmly maintain the stand of giving priority to the nation and attaching importance to it in order to improve the north-south relations and achieving fresh progress in the movement for national reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 When people prioritize their own nation, regard it as important and place it in the center of all thinking and acts, can they protect sovereignty and dignity and achieve development and prosperity in line with their faith, will and guts. 
					
					 No matter how big differences in the ideologies and social systems of the north and the south may be, they cannot surpass the common interests of the nation. 
					
					 As there can be neither classes nor social strata apart from the nation, it is possible to meet the interests of all the nation members when the national reunification, common interests of the nation, is achieved as early as possible. 
					
					 The above-said stand means the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The north and the south have a good experience of achieving big successes by realizing national cooperation and reenergizing dialogue and mutual help from the stand of By Our Nation Itself after the adoption of the historic June 15 joint declaration. These were something unimaginable in the past.
					
					 The north-south relations will radically develop and key matters will be solved in achieving the reunification of the country and common prosperity of the nation when all Koreans share intention and will from the nation-first stand and actively pursue national cooperation from the stance of attaching importance to the nation.
					
					 Whoever sincerely hopes for national reconciliation, unity and reunification should unhesitatingly take the road of giving priority to the nation and giving importance to it, free from the narrow-minded conception of confrontation. 
					
					 We will as ever make responsible and persistent efforts for improving relations between the north and the south from the above-said patriotic stand.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Projected U.S. Nuclear War Drills
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Projected U.S. Nuclear War Drills
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills the U.S. is going to stage in south Korea are nuclear war exercises for launching a surprise invasion by fabricating a world-stunning case on the basis of all sorts of plots and tricks against the DPRK. Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. military warmongers are letting loose a whole string of sophism that their war drills are "defensive ones" to cope with the "nuclear threat" from the DPRK and it is natural to stage regular military exercises. This is nothing but rhetoric falsifying the situation. 
					
					 The U.S. used to ignite a war of aggression on the basis of all sorts of plots and lies while staging saber-rattling in a terror-ridden atmosphere. 
					
					 In this way the U.S. has trampled down sovereignty of other countries under various pretexts. It is now mulling applying the same method to the DPRK. 
					
					 It is working hard to let Koreans in the north and the south fight each other and trigger off a fratricidal war in a bid to fish in troubled waters. It has a dangerous scenario to exterminate all Koreans in this world in the end.
					
					 The U.S., having such blood-stained history making people tremble with horror, claims that the DPRK, an inviolable country, is "threatening" world peace and security and a "rogue regime repeating provocation and appeasement." This provokes a side-splitting laughter. 
					
					 Important installations of the DPRK are strike targets of the units of aggression forces to be involved in the drills and the large scale combined landing operation scheduled to take place during the drills aims at occupying Pyongyang. This hard fact clearly proves the danger and gravity of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills. 
					
					 If a war breaks out owing to this saber-rattling of the U.S. war maniacs, the U.S. will never be safe either.

articles.title: Unity of S. Korean Progressive Forces Called for
articles.content:
Unity of S. Korean Progressive Forces Called for
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Members of different organizations of south Korea including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and the Solidarity for Progress and other figures held a meeting in Seoul on February 13 calling for the unity of the progressive forces, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News.
					 Speakers at the meeting said that they keenly realized the might of the solidarity struggle and its importance through the struggle of of people of all social strata for supporting the detained members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.
					
					 When all people get united, the might will be very strong, they said.
					
					 They noted that damage will affect the whole nation and forces of the democratic movement if a reunification movement organization is suppressed as long as the "Security Law" is allowed to be maintained. They called for struggling in unity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign publications carried special write-ups from January 30 to February 4 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in an article titled "Legacy of Kim Jong Il" posted on its website said Kim Jong Il bequeathed the great exploits guaranteeing the eternal foundation and rosy future of socialist Korea as his legacy.
					 He glorified the Juche idea, Songun idea as an eternal guiding idea of the DPRK and the great revolutionary idea of the era of independence.
					
					 He developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an ever-victorious guiding force, the DPRK into an invincible socialist state and the Korean People's Army (KPA) into a matchless powerful army.
					
					 He exerted top priority efforts for bolstering the defence capability, augmented the might of the KPA in every way through his ceaseless field guidance and firmly consolidated the whole country into an invulnerable fortress by putting all the people under arms and turning the whole country into a bastion at a new high level.
					
					 The undying exploits performed by him all his life will shine forever as the noblest legacy guaranteeing the accomplishment of the socialist cause in the DPRK and human cause of independence.
					
					 A Bangladeshi newspaper in an article titled "Exploits performed for the cause of socialism" introduced in detail the Songun leadership exploits Kim Jong Il performed by smashing the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK and firmly defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation.
					
					 An article introducing Mt. Paektu accompanied with a photo of sunrise over it was posted by German MS Tourist Agency on its website.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in Switzerland, Germany
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in Switzerland, Germany
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- There took place seminars, meeting and book and photo exhibition in Switzerland and Germany on Feb. 7 and 8 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 The chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Switzerland said at a seminar on Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party":
					
					 It is natural for the Korean people to hold in high esteem Kim Jong Il as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) for the exploits he performed on behalf of the era and the revolution by leading the party for a long period. It is in full line with the noble feelings and wishes of all the WPK members and people of the DPRK and moral sense of obligation.
					
					 The Korean people will surely emerge victorious in the drive to implement the idea and wishes of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as long as there is the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un and the single-minded unity around the WPK.
					
					 The chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany said in his speech at a meeting that a lot of works authored by Kim Jong Il serve as a beacon clearly indicating the way for mankind to follow.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany at a seminar said that Kim Jong Il is always alive in the hearts of mankind for his great exploits performed for the cause of global independence.
					
					 Messages of greeting to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events.

articles.title: Crucial Proposal and Open Letter of NDC of DPRK Supported by British Political Party
articles.content:
Crucial Proposal and Open Letter of NDC of DPRK Supported by British Political Party
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The February issue of Line of March, organ of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), carried an article in support of the crucial proposal and open letter of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 The article said:
					
					 The NDC of the DPRK sent the crucial proposal to the south Korean authorities to improve the north-south relations and create a climate of reconciliation.
					
					 It in its crucial proposal proposed the south Korean authorities to take a practical measure of stopping all acts of provoking and slandering each other and make a political decision to roll back the joint military drills under the pretext that they are "annual" and "defensive".
					
					 It also sent to the south Korean authorities, various political parties, public organizations and people of all strata an open letter calling for putting an end to history of national division that has brought pain to the Korean people for decades.
					
					 The Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) supports the crucial proposal and open letter of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 It firmly believes that the Korean people will surely achieve the reunification of the country under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Crucial Proposal of DPRK Supported by Indonesian Organization
articles.content:
Crucial Proposal of DPRK Supported by Indonesian Organization
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Indonesian Federation of Transport Workers Unions released a statement on Feb. 4 in support of the crucial proposal and open letter of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Indonesian Federation of Transport Workers Unions fully supports the crucial proposal and open letter of the NDC for opening up a new phase to improve the north-south relations and achieve national reunification.
					
					 They reflect the will of the DPRK to bring about a new phase of independent reunification and peace and prosperity by turning the inter-Korean relations of distrust and confrontation into the ones of trust and cooperation.
					
					 The NDC called on the south Korean authorities to completely stop all acts of provoking and slandering each other and military hostile acts against the other side to establish a climate for reconciliation and unity between the north and the south, take a practical measure for preventing a nuclear disaster and thus reenergize the north-south cooperation and exchange.
					
					 We urge the south Korean authorities to immediately respond to this and cancel its projected joint military drills for aggression with the U.S. as they are major hurdles lying in the way of improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The prospect of the inter-Korean relations hinges on the attitude of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should respond to the sincere initiative of the DPRK without delay.
					
					 We will as always positively support the Korean people in their just struggle to achieve the independence reunification and peace and prosperity by the concerted efforts of all Koreans.

articles.title: Demonstration Staged in Russia in Protest against U.S. War Drills
articles.content:
Demonstration Staged in Russia in Protest against U.S. War Drills
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- There took place a demonstration outside the building of the U.S. consulate general in Vladivostok, Russia on Feb. 7 in protest against the U.S. war drills against the DPRK.
					 It was attended by members of the Maritime Territorial Committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation and people from all walks of life in Vladivostok.
					
					 The participants vehemently denounced the U.S. for harassing peace and security in Northeast Asian including the Korean peninsula and other parts in the world by staging provocative war drills, holding flags of the DPRK and the former Soviet Union.
					
					 They expressed deep concern over the fact that the sphere of the joint military drills to be staged by the U.S. and south Korean authorities would cover the Maritime Territory of Russia, adding that in case a military conflict occurs in the peninsula, it would also bring a disaster to the territory.
					
					 Tearing up a U.S. flag and shouting slogans calling for peace against war, they strongly demanded the U.S. cancel its projected war drills at once.

articles.title: Work of Kim Jong Un Introduced by Organization of DR Congo
articles.content:
Work of Kim Jong Un Introduced by Organization of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The full text of Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's letter to the participants in the national conference of subworkteam leaders in the agricultural sector "Let Us Bring About Innovations in Agricultural Production under the Unfurled Banner of the Socialist Rural Theses" was posted by the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on its website on February 7.
					 The work, made public on Feb. 6, Juche 103 (2014), deals with the sea changes brought about in the socialist rural construction of the DPRK since the publication of the socialist rural theses (Feb. 25, 1964) and indicates tasks and ways to finally settle the rural question.

articles.title: Swiss Political Party Urges S. Korean Authorities to Accept Crucial Proposal of DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Political Party Urges S. Korean Authorities to Accept Crucial Proposal of DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Italian-Speaking Region in Switzerland sent a letter to the south Korean embassy in Switzerland on Feb. 1 supporting the crucial proposal of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK and opposing the projected U.S.-S. Korean joint military drills.
					 Noting the crucial proposal of the NDC of the DPRK is one for promoting cooperation and common well-being, the letter said:
					
					 And the projected joint war drills of the U.S. and south Korean authorities are very unreasonable.
					
					 Those war drills will not only imperil the stability and peace in the region but also do harm to the south Korean people.
					
					 We urge the south Korean authorities to stop provocation and hostile acts, respect the June 15 north-south joint declaration and the October 4 declaration for peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula and respond to the crucial proposal of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 We hope the south Korean authorities would accept our demand.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se retrata con activistas miembros de mando del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se retrata con activistas miembros de mando del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tomo fotos de recuerdo con los participantes en la reunion de los activistas miembros de mando del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino.
					Cuando el salio al area de filmacion, los participantes le dieron calurosa bienvenida con aclamaciones.
					
					El Comandante Supremo reciproco el saludo con su mano levantada y estimulo cordialmente a ellos que luchan con abnegacion por defender la patria y construir una potencia economica empunando el fusil en una mano y el martillo,  la hoz y el pincel en la otra.
					
					Diciendo que la presente reunion marca un hito importante para glorificar la autoctona idea de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y sus hazanas de direccion realizadas por la construccion de fuerzas civiles y para fortalecer mas las mismas, felicito a los participantes que concluyeron con exito la reunion y tomo fotos con ellos.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los participantes registraran un nuevo cambio revolucionario en el incremento de la combatividad del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino al materializar a cabalidad los legados de los Generalisimos y la linea del partido sobre el armamento de todo el pueblo y la fortificacion de todo el pais.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion el general de ejercito del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior, Choe Pu Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, y el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, O Il Jong.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente de Serbia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente de Serbia
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 15 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Serbia, Tomislav Nikolic, con motivo del Dia Nacional de ese pais.
					Convencido de que se desarrollaran de continuo las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, el remitente formulo votos por el progreso y prosperidad continuos del amistoso pueblo serbio.

articles.title: Distribuida declaracion de portavoz de CDN de RPDC como documento oficial de CS de ONU
articles.content:
Distribuida declaracion de portavoz de CDN de RPDC como documento oficial de CS de ONU
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- La declaracion del portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea "Las autoridades surcoreanas deben evidenciar su intento verdadero ante toda la nacion" fue distribuida el dia 13 como documento oficial no. S/2014/84 del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.

articles.title: Primeras elecciones democraticas en la RPDC
articles.content:
Primeras elecciones democraticas en la RPDC
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- El 9 de marzo que viene, los habitantes coreanos acudiran a las urnas para elegir a los diputados a la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En visperas de esos comicios, el pueblo coreano recuerda las primeras elecciones democraticas de Corea, efectuadas hace casi 70 anos.
					
					En aquel entonces, se presentaba la prioridad de consolidar legalmente el Comite Popular Provisional del Norte de Corea (CPPNC) para desarrollarlo como comite permanente.
					
					Instruyendo que en la Corea liberada hay que construir la Republica Popular Democratica, el Presidente Kim Il Sung movilizo a las masas populares a la fundacion de los comites populares locales de todos los niveles.
					
					A principios de septiembre del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche, quedaron aprobados en el segundo comite ampliado del CPPNC los estatutos sobre las elecciones de miembros de los comites populares locales.
					
					El 3 de noviembre del mismo ano, fue adoptada una resolucion de realizar en toda la extension geografica del Norte de Corea las elecciones de miembros de los comites populares provinciales, urbanos y distritales.
					
					En la V reunion del Comite Central del Frente Unido Nacional Democratico de Corea del Norte, convocada en septiembre, y en la II reunion del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo del Norte de Corea, se debatieron los problemas, inclusive el significado de las elecciones de miembros del comite popular y el caracter progresista del regimen electoral De esta manera, tuvieron lugar las elecciones de los candidatos a miembro de los comites populares de todos los niveles.
					
					En octubre del mismo ano, los moradores del canton de Samdung del distrito de Kangdong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur (en aquel entonces), eligieron al Presidente como candidato a miembro del Comite Popular de la Provincia recogiendo la unanime voluntad de toda la nacion coreana.
					
					El Presidente visito los distritos de Kangdong, Junghwa, Sakju y otras localidades y dirigio los preparativos de elecciones.
					
					El 3 de noviembre, se realizaron las elecciones democraticas por primera vez en la historia de la RPDC manifestando a todo el mundo el poderio de la unidad monolitica en torno al Presidente.
